パッケージ io.github.townyadvanced.flagwar.listeners

クラス FlagWarCustomListener

java.lang.Object
io.github.townyadvanced.flagwar.listeners.FlagWarCustomListener
すべての実装されたインタフェース:
org.bukkit.event.Listener
public class FlagWarCustomListener extends Object implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
General-purpose event listener for tracking Towny and FlagWar events.

  • フィールドの概要

    フィールド
    修飾子とタイプ
    フィールド
    説明
    static final String
    DENY_FLAG_RECENTLY_ATTACKED
    Holds localized string for key: error.player-was-recently-attacked.
    static final String
    DENY_FLAG_TOWN_UNDER_ATTACK
    Holds localized string for key: error.player-town-under-attack.

    コンストラクタ
    説明
    FlagWarCustomListener(FlagWar flagWar)
    Constructor: Sets the Towny instance, and passes on the logger from Bukkit.

  • メソッドの概要

    修飾子とタイプ
    メソッド
    説明
    void
    onCellAttackCanceledEvent(CellAttackCanceledEvent cellAttackCanceledEvent)
    If a CellAttackCanceledEvent is fired, and is not itself canceled, set the associated cell's lastFlagged timestamp, remove any associated WarZone, then log the cell info (CellUnderAttack.getCellString()).
    void
    onCellAttackEvent(CellAttackEvent cellAttackEvent)
    If the CellAttackEvent fires, and has not been canceled, this method tries running FlagWar.registerAttack(CellUnderAttack) using the cell from the CellAttackEvent.
    void
    onCellDefendedEvent(CellDefendedEvent cellDefendedEvent)
    If the CellDefendedEvent has not been canceled, update the town's lastFlagged timestamp, remove the associated warzone, broadcast the area was defended, then calculate any defender rewards.
    void
    onCellWonEvent(CellWonEvent cellWonEvent)
    When a CellUnderAttack has been won, and the CellWonEvent has not been canceled, remove the related WarZone, update the defending town's lastFlagged timestamp, handle payments, transfer ownership of the plot (or not), update Towny cache, and finally send messages for who won and messages regarding payouts.
    void
    onNationToggleNeutral(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.event.nation.toggle.NationToggleNeutralEvent nationToggleNeutralEvent)
    Listens for if a Nation attempts to declare neutrality.
    void
    onNationWithdraw(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.event.NationPreTransactionEvent nationPreTransactionEvent)
    Listens for attempts to interact with a Nation's EconomyAccount.
    void
    onTownLeave(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.event.town.TownLeaveEvent townLeaveEvent)
    Listen for if a Resident attempts to leave a Town.
    void
    onTownLeaveNation(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.event.nation.NationPreTownLeaveEvent nationPreTownLeaveEvent)
    When a Town atempts to leave a Nation, check that there are no active or recent attacks.
    void
    onTownSetHomeBlock(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.event.town.TownPreSetHomeBlockEvent townPreSetHomeBlockEvent)
    Listens for when a Town's HomeBlock would be (re)set.
    void
    onTownWithdraw(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.event.TownPreTransactionEvent townPreTransactionEvent)
    Similar to onNationWithdraw(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.event.NationPreTransactionEvent), prevents a Town's EconomyAccount from being looted by it's own players if the post-flag cooldown is still active.

  • フィールド詳細

    • DENY_FLAG_TOWN_UNDER_ATTACK

      public static final String DENY_FLAG_TOWN_UNDER_ATTACK
      Holds localized string for key: error.player-town-under-attack.

    • DENY_FLAG_RECENTLY_ATTACKED

      public static final String DENY_FLAG_RECENTLY_ATTACKED
      Holds localized string for key: error.player-was-recently-attacked.

  • コンストラクタの詳細

    • FlagWarCustomListener

      public FlagWarCustomListener(FlagWar flagWar)
      Constructor: Sets the Towny instance, and passes on the logger from Bukkit.
      パラメータ:
      flagWar - The FlagWar instance.

  • メソッドの詳細

    • onCellAttackEvent

      public void onCellAttackEvent(CellAttackEvent cellAttackEvent)
      If the CellAttackEvent fires, and has not been canceled, this method tries running FlagWar.registerAttack(CellUnderAttack) using the cell from the CellAttackEvent.
      パラメータ:
      cellAttackEvent - the associated CellAttackEvent.

    • onCellDefendedEvent

      public void onCellDefendedEvent(CellDefendedEvent cellDefendedEvent)
      If the CellDefendedEvent has not been canceled, update the town's lastFlagged timestamp, remove the associated warzone, broadcast the area was defended, then calculate any defender rewards.
      パラメータ:
      cellDefendedEvent - the CellDefendedEvent.

    • onCellWonEvent

      public void onCellWonEvent(CellWonEvent cellWonEvent)
      When a CellUnderAttack has been won, and the CellWonEvent has not been canceled, remove the related WarZone, update the defending town's lastFlagged timestamp, handle payments, transfer ownership of the plot (or not), update Towny cache, and finally send messages for who won and messages regarding payouts.
      パラメータ:
      cellWonEvent - The event declaring the cell attack successfully completed, and triggers the processing.

    • onCellAttackCanceledEvent

      public void onCellAttackCanceledEvent(CellAttackCanceledEvent cellAttackCanceledEvent)
      If a CellAttackCanceledEvent is fired, and is not itself canceled, set the associated cell's lastFlagged timestamp, remove any associated WarZone, then log the cell info (CellUnderAttack.getCellString()).
      パラメータ:
      cellAttackCanceledEvent - the CellAttackCanceledEvent

    • onTownLeaveNation

      public void onTownLeaveNation(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.event.nation.NationPreTownLeaveEvent nationPreTownLeaveEvent)
      When a Town atempts to leave a Nation, check that there are no active or recent attacks. If there are, cancel the NationPreTownLeaveEvent with the appropriate reason.
      パラメータ:
      nationPreTownLeaveEvent - the NationPreTownLeaveEvent.

    • onNationWithdraw

      public void onNationWithdraw(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.event.NationPreTransactionEvent nationPreTransactionEvent)
      Listens for attempts to interact with a Nation's EconomyAccount.

      If enabled, and an attempt to withdraw from the Nation's account while a Town in the Nation is under attack occurs, check if the Town itself is under attack or if it is still in a post-flag cooldown period, and cancel the transaction if either is true.

      Intended to prevent players from taking the Nation's money and running whilst in the middle of a war.

      パラメータ:
      nationPreTransactionEvent - Event fired by Towny prior to a Nation's EconomyAccount transaction being processed.

    • onTownWithdraw

      public void onTownWithdraw(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.event.TownPreTransactionEvent townPreTransactionEvent)
      Similar to onNationWithdraw(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.event.NationPreTransactionEvent), prevents a Town's EconomyAccount from being looted by it's own players if the post-flag cooldown is still active.
      パラメータ:
      townPreTransactionEvent - Event fired by Towny prior to a Town's EconomyAccount transaction being processed.

    • onTownSetHomeBlock

      public void onTownSetHomeBlock(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.event.town.TownPreSetHomeBlockEvent townPreSetHomeBlockEvent)
      Listens for when a Town's HomeBlock would be (re)set.

      If a Town is under attack and Flagged Interaction is prevented, or, if the Town is still in a post-flagged cooldown phase; cancel the event.

      パラメータ:
      townPreSetHomeBlockEvent - Event fired by Towny prior to setting a Town's HomeBlock.

    • onNationToggleNeutral

      public void onNationToggleNeutral(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.event.nation.toggle.NationToggleNeutralEvent nationToggleNeutralEvent)
      Listens for if a Nation attempts to declare neutrality.

      If a wartime nation cannot be neutral (according to Towny), cancel the neutrality declaration.

      If the wartime states can be neutral and the future state of the NationToggleNeutralEvent would be true, then for each Resident in the given Nation, cycle through and remove any active war flags from play.

      Does not stop already neutral nations from going hostile.

      パラメータ:
      nationToggleNeutralEvent - Event fired by Towny when a Nation attempts to toggle neutrality.

    • onTownLeave

      public void onTownLeave(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.event.town.TownLeaveEvent townLeaveEvent)
      Listen for if a Resident attempts to leave a Town.

      If the Town is under attack and Flagged Interaction is prohibited, or if it was recently attacked and on cooldown, prevent it's players from leaving the Town.

      パラメータ:
      townLeaveEvent - Event fired by Towny when a Town attempts to leave a Nation.
